name: Trickstar Rhodode
text: You can discard 1 "Trickstar" card, then target 1 "Trickstar" Link Monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Trickstar Rhodode" once per turn. Each time a card(s) is banished from your opponent's GY, immediately inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each card banished.
